00026 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_grid_control;
00028 using namespace std;

00030 #define INVALID_FILE "../../parsers/data/test.file.full_array_file"
00031 #define CALVIN_FILE "../../parsers/data/test.file.grc"
00032 #define GCOS_FILE "../../../file/CPPTest/data/test.grc"

00044 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00045 {
00046         FusionGrcFileReader *reader = new FusionGrcFileReader;
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader != NULL);
00048         delete reader;
00049 }

00052 {

00054         GridControlData data;
00055         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(INVALID_FILE, data) == false);

00058 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_missing_file()
00059 {
00060         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00061         GridControlData data;
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read("no_file", data) == false);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_calvin_grc_file()
00066 {
00067         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00068         GridControlData data;
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(CALVIN_FILE, data) == true);
00070 
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetColumns() == 5);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB1Probes() == 3);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1);
00076 
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).x == 0);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).y == 1);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).x == 2);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).y == 3);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).x == 4);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).y == 5);
00083 
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).x == 10);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).y == 11);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).x == 12);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).y == 13);
00088 
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).x == 10);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).y == 20);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void FusionGrcFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_gcos_grc_file()
00094 {
00095         FusionGrcFileReader reader;
00096         GridControlData data;
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( reader.Read(GCOS_FILE, data) == true);
00098 
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetRows() == 2) ;
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetColumns() == 2) ;
00101 
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumB1Probes() == 1) ;
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB1(0).x == 1);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB1(0).y == 0);
00105 
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2) ;
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(0).x == 0);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(0).y == 0);
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(1).x == 0);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetB2(1).y == 1);
00111 
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1) ;
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNS(0).x == 1);
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( data.GetNS(0).y == 1);
00115 
00116 }
